basicInfo.name: Ryan
basicInfo.flavor: Ryan stood up to the king's army on his own, but became gravely injured. The Revolutionaries suddenly appeared to protect him, and he ended up joining them because of it.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Allies (Self, Ally with the Highest ATK)
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 8s.
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 9s.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Skill Cooldown Reduction becomes 9s.

Skill 1.name: Go for the Head
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Blind. [Duration: 4 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants Taunt. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 155% of Physical Attack.
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Physical Damage Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Skill 2.name: Gale Slash
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Physical Attack 1 time(s). (Damage increases by up to 50%, proportional to the target's lost HP)
 - Deals additional damage equal to 230% of Physical Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit. (Damage increases by an amount equal to up to 50% of the target's lost HP)
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 170% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 270% of Physical Attack upon landing a Weakness Hit.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Passive.name: Demonic Swordsman
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Triple-Target Attack Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Grants Burn Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Burn Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Triple-Target Attack Damage by 31%

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Cael, Kyrielle, Elysia, meat in general, battle
profile.dislikes: Threats to his family, Bai Jiao, Velika, cowardice
profile.story: Ryan stood up to the king's army on his own, but became gravely injured. The Revolutionaries suddenly appeared to protect him, and he ended up joining them because of it.

basicInfo.name: Ryan
basicInfo.flavor: Upon learning that the King of Terra had sent an army to kill his demon-possessed brother, Ryan deserts the Holy Cross Crusaders and heads to his brother.

 - Allies (Self, Ally with the Highest ATK)
 - Reduces skill cooldowns by 8s.

 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

basicInfo.name: Ryan
basicInfo.flavor: Ryan wielded of a demonic sword before Sieg. He's friendly and cheerful, so he maintains a good relationship with those around him. He joined the Holy Cross Crusaders to save his demon-possessed younger brother, but his past before then remains a mystery.
